titleStmt.title: I being moved of the Lord, doth [sic] call unto you that are gathered together in Parliament.
titleStmt.author: Web, Mary.

notesStmt.note: Signed on p. 4 "...Mary Web, whom the world scornfully calls Quaker."
Imperfect: stained, creased, torn, and overwritten, with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in: Friends' Library (London, England).
